oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Main Street from Randolph Building
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Main Street at night, looking North from top of Randolph Building.” Color image, including Brennan’s Stage Hotel, Goodman Bros., Bush & Gerts Pianos.

“Miss Irene Brignardello -- Box 133 -- Paris -- Texas. -- Dear Irene: - All well and -- glad to hear the same -- from you -- We had a fifty -- pound melon yesterday -- and thought of you -- while eating -- Alice was tickled -- when I told her you -- sent kisses -- Lula.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Main Street; downtown; hotels; businesses; streets; buildings; Randolph Building;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: International Post Card Co., New York
